item.title: Yet Another PyJail - PySysMagic - L3ak CTF 2024
item.description:
<![CDATA[
I partecipated to the first edition ofL3ak CTF withFoocHackz. I solved this challenge, it wasn’t hard but writing a working exploit took me at least one/two hours.]]>

item.title: My First Writeup - ez-class - B01lers CTF 2023
item.description:
<![CDATA[
I liked this challenge a lot so I decided to create a writeup (my first, actually) about it. Thanks to the organizers for this wonderful CTF!]]>
